content:
Welcome to the interview, Jeyachandran. I'm Jeyachandran, the hiring officer. I'll be conducting a technical round with you today.

Let's start with your experience in AI. You mentioned that you developed an AI chatbot with real-time database integration and voice automation for an e-commerce website. Can you walk me through the process of creating the chatbot and some of the challenges you faced during development?

I'd love to hear more about the AI chatbot project you worked on.

Before you start, I just want to clarify that I'll be asking questions related to your experience and skills, and I'll be taking notes to assess your performance. Your feedback is much appreciated at the end of the interview.

Please go ahead and share more about the chatbot project, including the technologies you used and some of the challenges you faced.

Hello Jeyachandran! I'd like to get back on track with the conversation. You mentioned that you developed an AI chatbot with real-time database integration and voice automation for an e-commerce website. Can you walk me through the process of creating the chatbot and some of the challenges you faced during development?
